  3. Inline, split definition list

Inline, split definition list

Example
Category:
Grants for companies. This is a very long description

Usage notes

Displays the definition title and the description(s) on the same line floated away from each other. Only use one 'dd' per 'dt'. It does work well with long 'dds' though
